name: tm41
effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)

flavor_text.black_white: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
